name: Dual Painting #1 (2014) - Giotto, San Francesco predica agli uccelli, 1295-1300
description: The Dual Paintings series unveils the networked structure of the space-time of color. Each Dual Painting consists of a diptych that relates an emblematic painting from the history of art with its associated colored graph. This graph connects areas of similar colors to each other. The work establishes a duality between the infinite, continuous, analog space of color, and the finitude of networks in the digital world.
